content:
published 1947 note frost-tone was sold on 600 yard cones and sil-tone on 65 yard balls
**materials ** * lily frost-tone crochet cotton 1 cone ecru * lily sil-tone mercerized crochet cotton 2 balls each yellow orange lavender and purple * lily six strand floss 1 skein lt green * crochet hooks sizes 10 and 12
